attributes.action: After the Conservative Party losing another Leader, we need a General Election
attributes.additional_details:
Announcing her resignation, Ms Truss said a new prime minister would be chosen within a week. This is unacceptable

It will be the third Conservative prime minister since the last general election.

Who is leading our country should be decided in a general election, not in yet another Conservative leadership election

Its time for voters to decide who should govern the country
attributes.background:
The Conservative Party has no mandate left after all abrupt changes of policy, the U-turns, and multiple leaders stepping down since the last GE. The mandate they had is truly gone and there is no faith left in them.

Call a General Election and you will clearly see the will of UK citizens.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
